doc:
Bonnie Holiday https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bonnie_Holiday 0 Bonnie Holiday was a former American pornographic actress who worked during the 1970s and early 1980s.Holiday worked as a stripper and started out making loops. She then graduated to feature films with Alex de Renzy's Lady Freaks (1973),.Holiday was featured in the 1970 adult film documentary A History of the Blue Movie, which showed clips of stag films dating from 1915 to 1970. One of her best-known performances can be found in the XRCO Hall of Fame 1977 film Desires Within Young Girls. Bonnie_Holiday was a_former_American_pornographic_actress who worked during the_1970s and early_1980s . Holiday worked as a_stripper and started out making_loops . She then graduated_to_feature films with Alex de Renzy 's_Lady_Freaks_(_1973_)_, . Holiday was_featured in the_1970_adult_film_documentary_A_History of the_Blue_Movie , which showed clips of stag_films dating from 1915 to 1970 . One of her_best-known_performances can_be_found in the_XRCO_Hall of Fame_1977_film_Desires Within Young_Girls .
